= Makesequenom =

== Format ==
cg makeprimers regionfile archive maxsize prefsize dbdir threads

== Summary ==
Make sequencing primers for Sanger validation experiments

== Description ==
This command makes primers for sequencing target regions of the genome. Variants close together
can be grouped into regions first using the command:
{{{
cg makeregions selvariantlist.tsv 200 > regionfile.tsv
}}}

== Arguments ==
; **regionfile**: sft that has at least the columns chromosome, begin, end; must be sorted by chromosome, then begin
; **archive**: (ensembl) archive used: may2009 for hg18, empty for latest
; **maxsize**: the maximum amplicon size
; **prefsize**: the prefered amplicon size
; **dbdir**: directory containing reference genomes and variation data
; **threads**: how many threads to use (use 1)

== Category ==
Validation
